hints.content: Let's use the place value blocks on the chart to help us solve.

We can put our two numbers together on the place value chart.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/d8341deacd7f090bf69250e8a92441e61c23348c)

There are $7\text{ hundreds}, 9\text{ tens}$ and $12\text{ ones}$.

We can take our $12\text{ ones}$ and make $1\text{ ten}$ and $2\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/6e77b93b4ed476a6bee3e8659abacc21305a3974)

Now, we have $7\text{ hundreds}, 10\text{ tens}$ and $2\text{ ones}$.

We can take our $10\text{ tens}$ and turn them into $1\text{ hundred}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/2cd6a18fcd6e7e765a6f8f215b4c42e32e9968e8)

In all, there are $8\text{ hundreds}, 0\text{ tens}$ and $2\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/a847abf1655e94c77e59ce0ef7cfbdebcda86c08)

$800 + 0 + 2= 802$

question.content:

*Hint: Use the place value blocks to help solve.*
